name: WeatherTest
description: Unit tests for Weather class methods related to temperature conversion and description.

test_cases.name: temperatureCelsius
test_cases.description: Tests the temperatureCelsius method to ensure it returns a value matching the expected pattern.

test_cases.name: temperatureFahrenheit
test_cases.description: Tests the temperatureFahrenheit method to ensure it returns a value matching the expected pattern.

test_cases.name: temperatureCelsiusInRange
test_cases.description: Tests the temperatureCelsius method with a range to ensure it returns values within the specified range.

test_cases.name: temperatureFahrenheitInRange
test_cases.description: Tests the temperatureFahrenheit method with a range to ensure it returns values within the specified range.
